1.text: Place a medium-sized pot on the stove.

2.text: Add the white sugar, lemon juice, and warm water to the pot.

3.text: Bring the mixture to a boil over high heat.

5.text: Remove the pot from heat when the mixture turns golden brown.

6.text: Pour the mixture into a bowl or jar and let it cool for 30 minutes.

7.text: Scoop up a small amount of wax with your fingers.

8.text: Apply the wax to a small strip of skin.

9.text: Take a deep breath and pull!

10.text: Continue to apply the wax in small sections until you're done.

11.text: Pour any leftover wax in an airtight container and refrigerate it.
